eece4fdb-fbe2-4492-a8e9-6aaba4fb1488.description: A Calix Ethernet Access Network Specialist badge earner has demonstrated their ability to describe the basic operation of an Ethernet network, identify the role of each component in an access network, describe physical and logical topologies used in an access network, describe layer 2 topology protocols used in an access network, describe the layer 2 features used to manage and protect the access network, and describe the services provided by an access network (voice, video, data, business)
eece4fdb-fbe2-4492-a8e9-6aaba4fb1488.name: Ethernet Access Network Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Ethernet Access Network Specialist certification exam

7b908922-af93-4b88-acc5-a18b1efa9382.description: A Calix E7 GPON Specialist badge earner has demonstrated their ability to turn-up an E7, provision Ethernet transport, activate voice, video, and data services for GPON subscribers, and troubleshoot common faults to restore services.
7b908922-af93-4b88-acc5-a18b1efa9382.name: E7 GPON Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the E7 GPON Specialist certification exam

75c0657d-741d-437d-a479-97d2cb85e137.description: This badge earner has acquired a basic understanding of Wi-Fi technology including 802.11AX and 8x8 MIMO and best practices for deploying a wireless home network using Calix GigaFamily solutions. This badge earner can also diagnose and troubleshoot common home network issues and manage premises equipment using Calix Support cloud.

0c15aee9-56f5-42c7-b396-ba03e0037421.description: The E7 AXOS Specialist certification is designed for network operations, network architect and engineer who provision and maintain E7 AXOS services. Candidates must demonstrate their ability to deploy E7 AXOS Ethernet services and perform tasks such as turn-up and provisioning a single-port uplink, LAG, g.8032v2 and ERPS rings. Candidates must demonstrate their ability to use of SMx to add nodes and view system data.
